issue.title: [CF 523] Allow a default state for animations, or something similar
issue.body:
Pertains to Curse comments #2116, 2120, 2107, 2108, 2109, 2110, 2113

Poorly formatted quote of a latter part of the discussion with no context at all:

Still trying to figure out a good way to implement something that would make what you want possible.

comments.body:
Whoohoo! I can promise you I would get an enormous amount of benefit from this change.

Sometimes I have a really intricate icon (like my super-hacky system for detecting which pet I Grimoire of Sacrificed, and displaying the appropriate inherited ability's cooldown) that works amazing, it could not be created outside TellMeWhen without making my own custom addon.

Except if I accidentally /tmw, or zone, it gets all messed up because TellMeWhen stops things like "On Show" animations and resets Condition / Combat Event timers, etc.

It's really no major thing, in the heat of combat it's usually never an issue, but it would make everything a lot more tidy and stable when I have really elaborate icon designs going on. ^.~


> Posted by CurseForge user Lov3star

Added an On Icon Setup event in r648 that should be able to achieve this functionality.
